item.name: match
item.description: You could use this to light something. Wonder how it tastes.

light.action: print You strike the match on the bottom of your boot.
changeDescription This match is burning with a bright blue flame. Now find something to light! Or you could try to eat it?

eat.action: destroyNoun The match got digested. That sucks you could have used it to light the candle. Now you ruined that. Good job.

item.name: pencil
item.description: You could write on something with this.

item.name: candle
item.description: This candle could be lit. If only I had something that could light it. It's seems easily breakable too.

light.action: changeDescription This candle is burning bright.
destroyNoun The candle melted into nothing.

break.action: destroyNoun The candle is now useless.

item.name: paper
item.description: 8x10 ruled paper. I wish I remembered how to make a paper airplane with this. Guess I could write on it too if I had something to write with.

fold.action: print You fold the paper into a paper airplane. It flew right past some Chocolate crust! Better pick that up.
destroyNoun The paper airplane flies out the window.

write.action: print You write on the paper. Dear diary. I should have folded this into a paper airplane. Oh well.
destroyNoun You throw the paper away. Just don't need it.

item.name: amazon
item.description: A big river in South America.

item.name: map
item.description: where am I exactly?

item.name: jay
item.description: jammin jbone

cheat.action: cheat jay do you have our analytics graded?

item.name: super power
item.description: Homelander Style

item.name: tra
item.description: Art is backwards.

item.name: power
item.description: Powered Up!

item.name: mirror
item.description: A disturbing lack of a reflection doesn't stare you back in the face.

break.action: print You roundhouse kick the mirror
destroyNoun The mirror is broken. Seventy times seven years of bad luck for you!
destroyAll 490 years bag luck erased your inventory

item.name: gingerbread
item.description: It wants to eat you. I mean it wants you to eat it. Of course if gingerbread isn't your thing you can always karate kick it across the hall.

eat.action: print It crumbles in your mouth, cinnamon and sugar filling your nose. You sneeze. You keep the chocolate buttons though.
destroyNoun Just crumbles are left behind.

kick.action: print You kick the gingerbread across the hall with anger. You HATE gingerbread.
destroyNoun The gingerbread flies through the wall and makes a hole. You should use the door though.

item.name: chest
item.description: The chest is so ornate, you don't even think you need to open it. Could use some cleaning.

open.action: print When you open the chest, you notice lots of treasure inside! And a pie!!!!!!! WOOOHOOOO!
destroyNoun The lid fell off. Twas an old chest.

clean.action: print You take out your Febreeze spray and start cleaning the chest. You use Febreeze to clean a chest right?
destroyNoun The chest deteriorates. Guess you don't use Febreeze to clean a chest.

item.name: insects
item.description: Little, annoying, biting. Ya know - insects. You hate insects. You should end their existence.

squish.action: print In a flurry of activity, you crush the life out of all FIVE of the little, helpless, peace loving insects. You monster.
destroyNoun Opp turns out they were raisins.

kill.action: print In a flurry of activity, you crush the life out of all FIVE of the little, helpless, peace loving insects. You monster.

item.name: crystal sphere
item.description: You stare into the translucent, perfect crystal, and feel like it might be nice in there. These things grant wishes if I rub them right? Wonder whats inside.

rub.action: print You rub the sphere, wishing your secret wish.

break.action: print The crystal sphere shatters into a million pieces! Oh an apple fell out. How weird.
destroyNoun Now who's gonna clean this mess up.

item.name: chair
item.description: A chair to some, a bed to others. Maybe time for a rest.

sit.action: print You take a long needed rest on this amazing chair, around NINE minutes.

item.name: invitation
item.description: You open the invitation, which you notice is from the prince and NOT addressed to you. Stop snooping!

read.action: print The invitation contains some highly suspect things, such as 'Prince' and 'Ball' and a reference to some kind of required dress.

item.name: bottle
item.description: Who left this trash here. Someone should throw this away.

throw.action: print There we go. Good deed done.
destroyNoun Hope I don't see anymore bottles laying around.

recycle.action: print Saving the planet while I'm at it. Oh, theres a cream pie in the recycle bin. Well five second rule right?
destroyNoun Hope I don't see anymore bottles laying around.

item.name: tax returns
item.description: Oh its my tax returns. Maybe I should file my taxes.

file.action: print You file your taxes. The IRS owes you a cherry.
destroyNoun Glad I got that over with

item.name: shirt
item.description: The clothing, while folded, is just so small and cute you can't imagine who would fit in such finery! Seems like its your size

wear.action: print Oh wow its Gucci. Nice. And there's sugar in the pocket. dafuq?
destroyNoun Enough with fashion. I need to leave this place.

item.name: wardrobe
item.description: An old family wardrobe that magically vibrates. There seems to be no lock on it. I wonder if its smashable.

open.action: print You open the wardrobe. You find some eggs

smash.action: print You smash the wardrobe into pieces.
destroyNoun Welp. There goes the wardrobe.

item.name: laptop
item.description: Oh wow a macbook pro. It looks like intellij is open on it. Lots of bugs here. I can make better code than this.

code.action: print You write a hello world.
destroyNoun Null pointer Exception. laptop blows up

debug.action: print You debug this spaghetti code. A programmer jumps in through the window. Programmer: OMG how did you do that? Thanks! Here's a chess pie!
destroyNoun The programmer flies away with his laptop never to be seen again.

item.name: jack daniels whiskey no 47
item.description: some good ol whiskey.

drink.action: print You take a drink. Another. Might as well chug it!........... You wake up the next day next to some pecan pie and a picture of you in vegas.
destroyNoun Bottle is empty. Guess you did finish it.

item.name: boomerang
item.description: I wonder how far I can toss this. It's all in the flick of the wrist

toss.action: destroyNoun It didn't come back though

flick.action: print You flick the boomerang with great technique. It makes its way back with a banana
destroyNoun Enough of this boomerang. Gotta keep it moving

item.name: money
item.description: It's a hundred dollar bill. I can spend it or save it.

spend.action: print You buy some butter this cash you found.
destroyNoun The money is easy to spend and hard to make.

save.action: print How responsible of you. You put it in your savings account.
destroyNoun You're savings account is now $100 higher. Better not touch it.
